A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I went into this movie with high expectations\,I came out puzzle and crushed.All of the built up storylines from TFA so poorly handled here.The plot twists were also poorly handled.

The First Order is treated like nothing more than a bunch of bumbling baffoons....This is the feared successor to the Empire?They were portrayed as a legitimate threat in the original trilogy.Here they are treated as a punch line.Why do we need an episode 9 with these easily defeated morons as the enemy?

Snoke.....Why kill this character off so soon?Why not keep him around as a threat?I was really getting into his character and then he's just killed off.

This wasn't a "bad" movie\,however it wasn't good either.Had they made a few different choices it couldve been a great film.Like why not have Luke fight Kylo Ren or Snoke for real?That would've been a bad ass way of closing out the film and Luke's story arch.....But what we got instead....Smh
